text: mose-ui baegseongdeul-i geuui bujaejung-e geumsong-ajileul mandeul-eo sungbaehayeoss euni geugeos-eun hanaui hyeongchelo eummae hamyeo uneun deus boyeoss-euna geudeul-ege mal-eul hal su eobs-eossgo geudeul-eul baleun gillo indohaji moshayeoss-eum-ila geuleo na geudeul-eun geugeos-eul sungbaehayeoss-euni geudeul-eun umaehan jadeul-ila
